title: i need a ride to portland oregon and back 250.00 (saint joe to portland)
shortDescription:
i have to be in portland oregon from november 15-18 for a writers workshop. can anyone help me? 
i'm 30, trustworthy, and will give you 250.00 upfront then more when we get home. you will be paid well but you get 250.00 until i'm back. 
816-341-3138  [...]
